subject: Human Growth Hormone
Athletics and Sports
Tests and Testing
Doping (Sports)
Football
Baseball
Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: A disclosure that a rugby player in England tested positive for human growth hormone appeared to validate officials’ call to test for the substance in Major League Baseball and the N.F.L.
snippet: A disclosure that a rugby player in England tested positive for human growth hormone appeared to validate officials’ call to test for the substance in Major League Baseball and the N.F.L.
